SELECT education, DATE_FORMAT(pay_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS pay_date, pay_total, charge_total FROM course c JOIN pay_detail pd ON c.course_no=pd.course_no JOIN pay p ON pd.order_no=p.order_no
pay_refund=0
AND education = #{education}
AND pay_date BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startday}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endday}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND STR_TO_DATE(pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startday}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND STR_TO_DATE(pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endday}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY p.order_no DESC

SELECT sum(pay_total) as pay_total, sum(charge_total) as charge_total, education FROM course c JOIN pay_detail pd ON c.course_no=pd.course_no JOIN pay p ON pd.order_no=p.order_no
pay_refund=0
AND pay_date BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startday}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endday}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND pay_date >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startday}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND pay_date <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endday}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY education ORDER BY education
